alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 11:03AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, Limestone, northeastern Lauderdale and southern Lincoln Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1103 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Pulaski, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Huntsville, Madison, Athens, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Ardmore, Lexington, Harvest and Tanner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
